conbody.p: You can add multiple object properties to the Object's Properties table. Please note that object properties cannot share the same name in an object.

ol.li: In the Object's Properties panel, click Add.

li.p: In the displayed Add property dialog, specify the required information:

ul.li: Name: The object property's name. You can select one of the provided options (class, css, id, name, title, xpath) or enter a name manually.
Match condition: The condition is used for detecting the target object during execution.
Value: The value that completes a match condition.

conbody.p: The new property is added to the properties list as configured above. You can also change the properties' values here.
